events.title: QTSoc Career Panel
events.content: A chance to ask questions and interact with people working in the quantum industry and completing quantum related PhDs. These people were in the same shoes as most of you until very recently, so join us in hearing their journey into quantum.

events.title: QTSoc Quantum Talk Vol. 1
events.content: Quantum computing holds the key to unlocking groundbreaking solutions for sustainability challenges. By leveraging the unparalleled processing power of quantum computers, we can optimize renewable energy distribution, enhance climate modeling accuracy, and revolutionize material science for better environmental stewardship. This transformative technology offers a promising pathway to achieving a more sustainable and resilient future for our planet.
